    • setViewCorners

      public void setViewCorners​(Cell corner1, Cell corner2)
      Sets the corners for the area the engine shall provide updates for. The corners can be any two non-adjacent corners.
      Parameters:
      corner1 - First Corner
      corner2 - Second Corner (Non-Adjacent to corner1)

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds​(Cell cell)
      Returns whether a cell is inside the bounds or not.
      Parameters:
      cell - Cell to check
      Returns:
      Is Cell in Bounds?

    • getBottomRightBound

      public Cell getBottomRightBound()
      Returns:
      The Bottom Left Corner of the area the engine shall provide updates for

    • getTopLeftBound

      public Cell getTopLeftBound()
      Returns:
      The Top Right Corner of the area the engine shall provide updates for

    • getParallelCalculations

      public boolean getParallelCalculations()
      Returns:
      Should the Engine calculate in parallel or synchronized?

    • setUninitialized

      public void setUninitialized​(boolean uninitialized)
      Sets whether the engine should save all current cell states as changes. Good if UI needs a full update
      Parameters:
      uninitialized -

      Returns:
